command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$parameters.properties.egressNatRules" options="egress-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.gatewayCustomBgpIpAddresses" options="gateway-custom-bgp-ip-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="$parameters.properties.ingressNatRules" options="ingress-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@IpsecPolicy_create>" var="$parameters.properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies" options="traffic-selector-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].localAddressRanges" options="local-address-ranges" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].remoteAddressRanges" options="remote-address-ranges" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.tunnelProperties" options="tunnel-properties" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.identity.userAssigned" options="mi-user-assigned user-assigned" group="Identity">
<arg type="array" var="@BgpSettings_create.bgpPeeringAddresses" options="bgp-peering-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@BgpSettings_create.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses" options="custom-bgp-ip-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.ipConfigurations" options="ip-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.natRules" options="nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_create>" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings" options="external-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings" options="internal-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" options="virtual-network-gateway-policy-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups[].properties.policyMembers" options="policy-members" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.radiusServers" options="radius-servers">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations" options="vng-client-connection-configurations">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations[].properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" options="virtual-network-gateway-policy-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnAuthenticationTypes" options="vpn-authentication-types">
<arg type="array" var="@AddressSpace_create.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies" options="vpn-client-ipsec-policies">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols" options="vpn-client-protocols">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates" options="vpn-client-revoked-certificates">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRootCertificates" options="vpn-client-root-certificates">

json.schema:
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="egressNatRules" arg="$parameters.properties.egressNatRules">
<prop type="array" name="gatewayCustomBgpIpAddresses" arg="$parameters.properties.gatewayCustomBgpIpAddresses">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="ingressNatRules" arg="$parameters.properties.ingressNatRules">
<prop type="array<@IpsecPolicy_create>" name="ipsecPolicies" arg="$parameters.properties.ipsecPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="trafficSelectorPolicies" arg="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="localAddressRanges" arg="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].localAddressRanges" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteAddressRanges" arg="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].remoteAddressRanges" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="tunnelProperties" arg="$parameters.properties.tunnelProperties">
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.identity.userAssigned">
<prop type="array" name="bgpPeeringAddresses" arg="@BgpSettings_create.bgpPeeringAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="customBgpIpAddresses" arg="@BgpSettings_create.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses">
<prop type="array" name="ipConfigurations" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.ipConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="natRules" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.natRules">
<prop type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_create>" name="externalMappings" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings">
<prop type="array" name="internalMappings" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings">
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups">
<prop type="array" name="policyMembers" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups[].properties.policyMembers" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="radiusServers" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.radiusServers">
<prop type="array" name="vngClientConnectionConfigurations" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations[].properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="vpnAuthenticationTypes" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnAuthenticationTypes">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes" arg="@AddressSpace_create.addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientIpsecPolicies" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientProtocols" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientRevokedCertificates" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientRootCertificates" arg="@VirtualNetworkGateway_create.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRootCertificates">

<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@SubResource_read>" name="vngClientConnectionConfigurations">

<prop type="array" name="vngClientConnectionConfigurations">

command.name: update

help.short: Bypass ExpressRoute gateway for data forwarding.
Space-separated tags: key[=value] [key[=value] ...]. Use "" to clear existing tags.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$parameters.properties.egressNatRules" options="egress-nat-rules" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.gatewayCustomBgpIpAddresses" options="gateway-custom-bgp-ip-addresses" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$parameters.properties.ingressNatRules" options="ingress-nat-rules" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ipsecPolicies" options="ipsec-policies" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies" options="traffic-selector-policies" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].localAddressRanges" options="local-address-ranges">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.trafficSelectorPolicies[].remoteAddressRanges" options="remote-address-ranges">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.tunnelProperties" options="tunnel-properties" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@BgpSettings_update.bgpPeeringAddresses" options="bgp-peering-addresses">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@BgpSettings_update.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses" options="custom-bgp-ip-addresses">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.ipConfigurations" options="ip-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.natRules" options="nat-rules" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@VpnNatRuleMapping_update>" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings" options="external-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings" options="internal-mappings" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" options="virtual-network-gateway-policy-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups[].properties.policyMembers" options="policy-members" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.radiusServers" options="radius-servers">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations" options="vng-client-connection-configurations">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations[].properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" options="virtual-network-gateway-policy-groups" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnAuthenticationTypes" options="vpn-authentication-types">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@AddressSpace_update.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies" options="vpn-client-ipsec-policies">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols" options="vpn-client-protocols">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates" options="vpn-client-revoked-certificates">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkGateway_update.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRootCertificates" options="vpn-client-root-certificates">

help.short: The DH Groups used for initial SA.
The Pfs Groups used for new child SA.
The payload size in KB for P2S client.
The lifetime in seconds for P2S client.

help.short: The DH Group used in IKE Phase 1 for initial SA.
The Pfs Group used in IKE Phase 2 for new child SA.
The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) payload size in KB for a site to site VPN tunnel.
The IPSec Security Association (also called Quick Mode or Phase 2 SA) lifetime in seconds for a site to site VPN tunnel.
